name: Bacon Wrapped Pineapple
author: Paul E Hamilton
summary: I started making these for family get-togethers and everyone LOVED them.  No one could eat enough of them.  I am also using them when I cater my daughter's wedding.
ingredients: ½ pound sliced bacon, cut into thirds
1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice, drained
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Wrap each chunk of pineapple with a piece of bacon and secure with toothpicks
Place in a shallow baking dish
In a small bowl, stir together the brown sugar, mayonnaise and chili sauce; pour over the bacon wrapped pineapple
Bake uncovered for 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until bacon is crispy on the edges and the sauce is bubbly
